vulnerability.name: CVE-2021-24032
vulnerability.description: Beginning in v1.4.1 and prior to v1.4.9, due to an incomplete fix for CVE-2021-24031, the Zstandard command-line utility created output files with default permissions and restricted those permissions immediately afterwards. Output files could therefore momentarily be readable or writable to unintended parties.

statements.status_notes: package manager and base image os commands non-accessable.
statements.impact_statement: pre-build code is only affected by this vulnerablity. Advisary would need to alter source code and provide a vulnerable build to be exploitable
